context: Analyze this standing side bend pose and identify comprehensive transition relationships. Extended Side Angle (Utthita Parsvakonasana) Deep side stretch from warrior II with forearm to thigh. Consider the Side body lengthening, leg strength, spinal mobility. Analyze transitions that flow naturally from this pose and evaluate both immediate possibilities and progressive developments. Factor in modifications for different ability levels and the pose's role in creating balanced sequences.

practitioner.position: Deep side stretch from warrior II with forearm to thigh
practitioner.primaryFocus: Side body lengthening, leg strength, spinal mobility

specificNeeds: Side body lengthening, leg strength, spinal mobility
